instructions: Open the App Store on your iPhone. Tap your profile picture. Scroll down to Updates and tap Update next to WhatsApp Messenger. Don't see the Update prompt and instead see WhatsApp listed under Updated Recently with a prompt to open it? This means there are no updates pending for WhatsApp so you're all set. Wait for the update to finish installing.
Tap Settings . Tap your name/profile ID. Tap iTunes & App Store . Tap the App Updates toggle to enable it.
Tap Google Play Store. Tap the Hamburger menu . Tap My Apps & Games . Tap Update next to WhatsApp Messenger.
Tap Google Play Store . Tap the Hamburger menu > My Apps & Games > WhatsApp . Tap the More icon. Tap Enable Auto Update .
